summary:
This mod adds a basements with all craftstations to Whiterun Breezehome .
Location = Outside the BreezeHome
descriptionHtml:
ECP-BreezeHomeBasement
--------------------------------
BreezeHomeBasement is another mod made by Elite Cinema Projects .
this mod adds a whole basement with lots of stuff in it to Whiterun .
its location is just outside BreezeHome .

[Update] Video has been uploaded !

Features 
--------------
- All CraftStations in one room
- All CraftStations have one or more named chest

* named chests are :
> Alchemy Table - Ingridients
> WorkBensh     - Misc
> Tanning Rack  - Misc
> Anvil         - Armor
> GrindStone    - Weapons
> CookingPot    - Food
> Enchanter     - Gems
> Smelter       - Ores + Bars
> Extra Corner  - 2x Extra

Requests
-----------------------------
got any requests for mod ?
comment below or add me and i\'ll do my best !
Steam = jongen603
Nexus = sushikiller
author: Sushikiller
